divs: Sighting DetailsI have spotted satellites reflecting the sun in the night sky from the comfort of the hot tub hundreds of times, this one was different. One night my wife Tracie and I were walking to the car and I happened to look up. The night sky was crystal clear and the stars were bright. I saw a moving pinpoint of light traveling in a Northerly direction. I pointed it out to Tracie and we both watched it for about 45 seconds, until the point of light made a dead left turn without slowing down at all. We watched for another 20 or so seconds until the point of light desappeared over the trees.
